discussion.content:
It should be Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management only as it has Sales Order capabilities
 https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/learn/modules/configure-manage-order-cash-dyn365-supply-chain-mgmt/2-1-create-process-sales-orders
what we are looking for is "a solution", not a set of solutions. Selecting 'Supply Chain Management only' fulfils this requirement
